channel.title: CVE Feed for AndroVideo -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AndroVideo -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-13408|2024-09-17T01:26:55.568Z -- androvideo -- advan%20vd-1%20firmware
item.description: A relative path traversal vulnerability found in Advan VD-1 firmware versions up to 230. It allows attackers to download arbitrary files via url cgibin/ExportSettings.cgi?Download=filepath, without any authentication.

item.title: CVE-2019-11064|2024-09-17T00:36:59.288Z -- androvideo -- advan%20vd-1%20firmware
item.description: A vulnerability of remote credential disclosure was discovered in Advan VD-1 firmware versions up to 230. An attacker can export system configuration which is not encrypted to get the administratorâ€™s account and password in plain text via cgibin/ExportSettings.cgi?Export=1 without any authentication.
